channel.title: National Vulnerability Database
channel.description: This feed contains the most recent CVE cyber vulnerabilities published within the National Vulnerability Database.
channel.dc:rights: This material is not copywritten and may be freely used, however, attribution is requested.

item.title: CVE-2008-5361 (air, flash_player)
item.description: The ActionScript 2 virtual machine in Adobe Flash Player 10.x before 10.0.12.36 and 9.x before 9.0.151.0, and Adobe AIR before 1.5, does not verify a member element's size when performing (1) DefineConstantPool, (2) ActionJump, (3) ActionPush, (4) ActionTry, and unspecified other actions, which allows remote attackers to read sensitive data from process memory via a crafted PDF file.

item.title: CVE-2008-5362 (air, flash_player)
item.description: The DefineConstantPool action in the ActionScript 2 virtual machine in Adobe Flash Player 10.x before 10.0.12.36 and 9.x before 9.0.151.0, and Adobe AIR before 1.5, accepts an untrusted input value for a "constant count," which allows remote attackers to read sensitive data from process memory via a crafted PDF file.

item.title: CVE-2008-5501 (firefox, seamonkey, ubuntu_linux)
item.description: The layout engine in Mozilla Firefox 3.x before 3.0.5, Thunderbird 2.x before 2.0.0.19, and SeaMonkey 1.x before 1.1.14 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via vectors that trigger an assertion failure.

item.title: CVE-2018-9516
item.description: In hid_debug_events_read of drivers/hid/hid-debug.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android kernel Android ID: A-71361580.
item.dc:creator: TestAutor
